data.title: All 70 Mike Myers Movies (in Order)

Alice Hartman

Â·

Get ready to laugh and reminisce with our roundup of Mike Myersâ€™ movies. From his hilarious portrayal of a wayward child in â€œWayneâ€™s Worldâ€ to his iconic role as Austin Powers, join us as we take a journey through the fun and memorable films of this beloved comedian.

1. John and Yoko: A Love Story (1985)

John and Yoko: A Love Story delves into the lives of iconic music legends John Lennon and Yoko Ono, exploring their journey from obscurity to worldwide fame. The film unfolds the intriguing and complex story of these two extraordinary artists and their passionate relationship, as it metamorphoses from a chance encounter to an unshakable bond that withstands the test of time.

ğŸ“º Watch now free with Prime

ğŸ–¼ï¸ Check out these cool movie posters & art

2. Wayneâ€™s World (1992)

Get ready to rock out with Mike Myers and Dana Carvey in the hilarious 1992 hit, Wayneâ€™s World! . Following the lives of two lazy but talented friends, the movie takes you on a wild journey as they attempt to elevate their public-access cable show. Filled with outrageous antics, heavy metal moments, and a dash of self-aware humor, Wayneâ€™s World pushes the boundaries of entertainment and comedic timing.

With an impressive lineup of talented actors and writers, this special edition offers a blend of satire, parody, and social satire that keeps viewers laughing and entertained.
